"Seasonal Enemies":
"During Seasonal Events, some enemies in some Sections will have a special marking on them, and their Attribute weakness will be different from usual. In addition, all Rappies will have their names and appearances changed. These are known as Seasonal Enemies.

If you defeat them, you can earn Seasonal Points, as well as special limited-time items."

"The \"Night Shift\" Xiandy mentioned refers to the night-time state of the enemies known as \"Alters\".

Alters have different appearances and properties between day and night, and this change is known as \"Daynight Shift\" (separately, Day Shift and Night Shift)."
